column2: but was expecting much better flavors from a highly praised chef and restaurant. Kobe Beef skewers we good
column4: but lacked a a stronger flavor
column5: if the chef wasnt aiming for explosive flavor I'm judging wrong. The foie gras and scallop sushi was ok
column7: had better quality scallop and foie gras. The kata special chirashi was mediocre as well. I did my best to focus on the tastes of the different fishes but couldn't tell much of a difference. Tonkotsu ramen was mediocre at best but the oxtail ramen was pretty yummy:) Overall I was disapointed in the quality of sushi
